name: Lejettie Curry
text: It was the best pizza in town, hands down!!

name: Jimmie OBerry
text: The place was very cleac. The  Service was great. I ordered a lunch special with a small pizza and a drink And garden salad.  It was about $15 but enough to eat off of twice pizza with double the size I thought it was going to be and was …More

name: RKR O
text: Great staff and great pizza. They hosted our school group and let the kids into the kitchen to make their own pizza's. Thank you so much for your kind hospitality!

name: Sonya Lane
text:
Nice & clean. We had a very helpful & friendly waitor. The owner also checked to ensure we were satisfied
He also helped as we placed left overs in a to go box. Our pizza was good. Had loads of toppings! I would go back.

name: Terra Fals
text: We'd just moved to Jesup and wanted some pizza.. Well, Marco's staff made us feel like royalty ! Extremely friendly staff, phenomenal food, and the prices are very reasonable. We definitely are going to make this restaurant a family favorite!

name: Brenda Matteliano
text: If you guys are going to or through Jesup, Ga you MUST try Marco''s Pizza. This is the BEST pizza we have found in Georgia since leaving New York!  Super nice staff and owner!

name: Jerry McGhoulBerry
text: I’ve been coming here since this establishment opened and I enjoy their pizza and cheesy bread ! However, my experience will never be good again. I will never come back due to a very disrespectful worker. She was not helpful, arrogant , …More

name: Don Wilson
text: Great pizza, great service, we had the Deluxe Uno this time and it was yummy. And the prices are better than the monkey place too! They always seem consistent but sometimes overcook the thin crust pies.

name: KJ Phillips
text: Great pizza excellent pricing with conscientious owners. I would definitely recommend

name: Kathy Collins
text: The Meatball Sub was delicious...the bun was tender and good as well. Great and Friendly atmosphere.

name: Ana María Perez
text: Excellent service all delicious if I recommend it.

name: Upgrade Me BB
text: Awesome food extra cheesy pizza! Deja was our server. She was so kind and attentive. My family had a good time

name: Brandon Nease
text: Very nice people. Good service!

name: jhon rigo
text: Best pizza in Jesup Chris is best mag in Jesup ga

name: Elizabeth Kelly
text: I've usually had a great experience with Marcos, but tonight, the sub was soggy and had no flavor.  Our chicken dippers were cold and grainy in the middle.  It seems like they were refrozen before being cooked.  Our cheese bread was fine.  I'm not sure what happened and know it might just be a bad night.

name: duane bell
text: Every Friday is pizza night. Marcos has become our Friday night first choice. The owners are very nice and very accommodating to request.

name: Eva Foster
text: Great food and service! Bread for sandwiches was awesome...

name: Keith Brown
text: Food and service was good and accomodateing.

name: Paul Stout
text: Love this pizza place.best one in jesup and always great service

name: Tess Graniglia
text: I’m really picky about pizza because my family is from Italy but I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the food! The environment was also very nice and clean and the staff were friendly and helpful.

text: Best pizza!  Great service!
